verses.padam: - Padam aśmann|Urja̱m|parva̍tE|śiśriyAṇAm|vAtE̱|parjanyE̱|varu̍ṇasya|śuṣmE̱||adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|vanaspatiBya̍ iti vanaspati# - Byaḥ|adhIti|saMBRu̍tAmiti̍ saM - BRutAm|tAm|naḥ|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|dhatta|marutaḥ|saṃqrarAṇA iti# saM - rarAṇAḥ||aśmann|tE|kṣut|amum|tE|śuk|RucCatu|yam|dviṣmaḥ||samudrasya̍|tvA|avAka̍yA|agnE̱|parIti̍|vyayAmasi||pAvakaḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|śivaḥ|Bava||himasya|tvA|jarAyu̍ṇA|agnE̱|parIti̍|vyayAmasi||pAvakaḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|śivaḥ|Bava||upEti|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aśmannUrjaM parvatE̍ śiśriyAṇAM ~MvAtE# parjanyE varuṇasya̍ śuṣmE̱|adBya OṣadhIByO̍ vanaspatiByO&dhi saMBRutAM̍ tAM na iṣamUrjaM̍ dhatta marutaḥ saṃ rarAṇAḥ||aśmaṅstE̍ kṣudamuM tE śugRucCatu̍ yaM dviṣmaḥ||samudrasya# tvA&*vAkayA&gnE pari# vyayAmasi|pAvakO asmaByaṃ# śivO Bava||himasya̍# tvA jarAyuṇA&gnE pari# vyayAmasi|pAvakO asmaByaṃ# śivO Bava||upa̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam jmann|upEti|vEtasE|ava̍ttaramityava̍t-taram|nadIṣu̍|A||agnE̱|pittam|apAm|asi||maṇḍU̍ki|tABi̍ḥ|Eti̍|gahi|sA|imam|naḥ|yajñam||pAvakava̍rṇamiti̍# pAvaka - varṇam|śivam|kRudhi||pAvakE|Eti|citaya̍ntyA|kRupA||kṣAmann̍|rurucE|uṣasa̍ḥ|na|BAnunA̱||tUrvann̍|na|yAmann̍|Eta̍śasya|nu|raṇE̱|Eti̍|yaḥ|GRuṇE||na|tatRuṣAṇaḥ|ajara̍ḥ||agnE̱|pAvaka|rOciṣA̱|mandrayA̱|dEva|jihvayA̱||Eti̍|dEvAn|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -jmannupa# vEtasE&vattaraM̍ nadIṣvA|agnE# pittamapAmasi||maṇḍU̍ki̍ tABirA gahi̍ sEmaM nO# yajñaM|pAvakavarṇaṃ̍ śivaM kRudhi||pAvaka̍ A citayantyA̍ kRupA|kṣAman̍ ruruca uṣasO na BAnunA̱||tUrvan na yAmannEtaśasya̍ nU raṇa A yO GRuṇE|na tatRuṣAṇO̍ ajaraḥ||agnE̍# pAvaka rOciṣA# mandrayA# dEva jihvayA̱|A dEvAn - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam vakṣi|yakṣi|ca||saḥ|naḥ|pAvaka|dIdivaḥ|agnE̱|dEvAn|iha|Eti̍|vaha||upEti̍|yajñam|haviḥ|ca|naḥ||apAm|idam|nyaya̍namiti̍# ni - ayanam|samudrasya̍|nivEśa̍namiti̍# ni - vEśanam||anyam|tE|asmat|tapantu|hEtaya̍ḥ|pAvakaḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|śivaḥ|Bava||namaḥ|tE|hara̍sE|śOciṣE̱|nama̍ḥ|tE|astu|arciṣE̱||anyam|tE|asmat|tapantu|hEtaya̍ḥ|pAvakaḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|śivaḥ|Bava||nRuṣada iti# nRu - sadE̱|vaṭ|3 (50)
verses.samhita: vakṣi̍ yakṣi# ca||sa naḥ̍ pAvaka dIdivO&gnE# dEvAṃ ihA&& vaha|upa̍# yajñaṃ haviśca# naḥ||apAmidaM nyayanaṃ̍ samudrasya# nivEśanaM|anyaM̍ tE# asmat tapantu̍ hEtayaḥ̍ pAvakO asmaByaṃ# śivO Bava||nama̍stE̍ harasE̍ śOciṣE namastE̍ astvarciṣE̱|anyaM tE# asmat tapantu̍ hEtayaḥ̍ pAvakO asmaByaṃ# śivO Bava||nRuṣadE̍ vaḍa# - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam aPsuṣada ityaPsu̍ - sadE̱|vaṭ|vanasada iti# vana - sadE̱|vaṭ|barqḥiṣada iti# baṛhi - sadE̱|vaṭ|suvarvida iti# suvaḥ - vidE̱|vaṭ||yE|dEvAḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yajñiyA̱ḥ|yajñiyAnAm|saM~MvathsarIṇamiti̍# saM - vathsarIṇa̱m|upEti|BAgam|Asa̍tE||ahutAda̍ ityahuta̍ - adaḥ|haviṣa̍ḥ|yajñE|asminn|svayam|juhuddhvam|madhu̍naḥ|GRutasya̍||yE|dEvAḥ|dEvEṣU̍|adhIti̍|dEvatvamiti̍# dEva - tvam|Ayann|yE|brahma̍ṇaḥ|pura̍ EtAra iti# puraḥ - EtAraḥ|asya||yEBya̍ḥ|na|RutE|pava̍tE|dhAma̍|kim|cana|na|tE|divaḥ|na|pRuthivyAḥ|adhIti̍|snuṣu̍||prAṇadA̍ iti# prAṇa - dAḥ|4 (50)
verses.samhita: -PsuṣadE vaḍ vanasadE̍ vaḍ baṛhiṣadE̍ vaṭth suvarvidE̍ vaṭ||yE dEvA dEvAnA̱M ~MyajñiyA# yajñiyAnAṃ̍ saM~Mvath sarIṇamupa# BAgamAsatE|ahutAdO̍# haviṣO# yajñE asminth svayaM juhuddhvaM̍ madhunO̍ GRutasya||yE̍ dEvA dEvEṣvadhi# dEvatvamAyanq yE brahmaṇaḥ̍ pura EtArO# asya|yEByO nartE pavatE̍ dhAma kiM cana na tE divO na pRuthivyA̍ adhi snuṣu||prAṇadA̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam apAnadA ityapAna̍ - dAḥ|vyAnadA iti# vyAna - dAḥ|cakṣurdA iti# cakṣuḥ-dAḥ|varcOdA iti# varcaḥ-dAḥ|varivOdA iti# varivaḥ-dAḥ||anyam|tE|asmat|tapantu|hEtayaḥ|pAvakaḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|śivaḥ|Bava||agniḥ|tigmEna|śOciṣA̱|yaṃsa̍t|viśva̱m|nIti̍|atriṇa̱m||agniḥ|naḥ|vaṃqsatE|rayim||saḥ|EnA|anI̍kEna|suvidatra̍ iti# su-vidatraḥ|asmE̍ iti|yaṣṭA̱|dEvAn|Aya̍jiṣṭha̍ ityA-yajiṣṭhaḥ|svasti||adabdhaḥ|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ|uta|naḥ|paraspA iti# paraḥ - pAḥ|agnE̱|dyumaditi# dyu - mat|uta|rEvat|didIhi||5 (44) (upa-dEvAn-vaṭ-prA̍ṇadA-ścatu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: apAnadA̍ vyAnadAśca̍kṣurdA̍ varcOdA̍ varivOdAḥ|anyaM̍ tE# asmat tapantu̍ hEtayaḥ̍ pAvakO asmaByaṃ# śivO Bava||agnistigmEna̍# śOciṣA yaṃsadviśvaM nyatriṇa̱M|agnirnO̍# vaṃsatE rayiM||sainA&nIkEna̍ suvidatrO# asmE yaṣṭA# dEvAṃ Ayajiṣṭhaḥ̍ svasti|adabdhO̍ gOpA uta naḥ̍ paraspA agnE̱ dyumaduta rEvad-didIhi||5̍ (upa-dEvAn-vaṭ-prA̍ṇadA-ścatu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam ya|imA|viśvA̱|BuvanAni|juhva̍t|Ruṣi̍ḥ|hOtA̱|niṣasAdEti̍# ni - sasAda|pitA|naḥ||saḥ|AśiṣEtyA̱̍ -śiṣA̱|draviṇam|icCamA̍naḥ|paramacCada̍ iti# parama - Cadaḥ|varE̱|Eti̍|vivEśa||viśvakarmEti̍# viśva-karmA|manasA|yat|vihA̍yA̍ iti vi-hAyAḥ|dhAtA|vidhAtEti# vi - dhAtA|paramA|uta|sandRugiti# saM-dRuk||tEṣA̱m|iṣṭAni|samiti̍|iṣA|madanti|yatra̍|saptarq.ṣIniti̍# sapta-RuṣIn|paraḥ|Eka̱m|Ahuḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|pitA|janitA|yaḥ|vidhAtEti# vi - dhAtA|yaḥ|naḥ|sataḥ|aBi|Eti|sat|jajAna̍||6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ya imA viśvA BuvanAni̍ juhvadRuṣirqḥOtA# niṣasAdA# pitA naḥ|sa̍ AśiṣA draviṇamicCamA̍naḥ̍ paramacCadO vara A vivEśa||viśvaka̍rmA̍ manasA̍ yadvihAyA̍ dhAtA vidhAtA̍ paramOta̍ sandRuk|tEṣAmiṣṭAni̍ samiṣA madanti̍ yatra# saptarq.ṣIn para EkamAhuḥ||yO̍ naḥ̍ pitA janitA̍ yO vidhAtA̍ yO naḥ̍ satO aByA sajjajAna|6̍

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|nAmadhA iti# nAma - dhAḥ|Ekaḥ|Eva|tam|sapraMqśnamiti̍# saM - praśnam|BuvanA|yanti|anyA||tE|Eti̍|ayajanta|dravi̍ṇam|samiti̍|asmai|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|pUrvE̱|jaritAra̍ḥ|na|BUnA||asUrtA̱|sUrtA̱|raja̍saḥ|vimAna̍ iti# vi - mAnE̱|yE|BUtAni|samakRu̍ṇvanniti̍# saM - akRuṇvann|imAni̍||na|tam|vidAtha|yaḥ|idam|jajAna̍|anyat|yuṣmAka̱m|anta̍ram|BavAti||nIhArEṇa̍|prAvRu̍tAḥ|jalpyA̱|ca|asutRupa̍ ityasu̍ - tRupaḥ|ukthaśAsa̍ ityuktha̍ - śAsaḥ|caranti||paraḥ|divA|paraḥ|EnA|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO dEvAnA̱M nAmadhA Eka# Eva taṃ sapraMśnaM̍ BuvanA̍ yantyanyA||ta A&yajanta̍ draviṇaṃq̍ samasmA̍ Ruṣayaḥ̍ pUrvE# jaritArO na BUnA|asUrtA sUrtA rajasO̍ vimAnE yE BUtAni# samakRuṇvannimAni̍||na̍ taM ~MvidAtha̍ ya idaM jajAnAnyad yuṣmAkamantaraM̍ BavAti|nIhArEṇa prAvRutA̍ jalpyA# cAsutRupa# uktha śAsaścaranti||parO̍ divA para EnA - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyA|paraḥ|dEvEBiḥ|asu̍raiḥ|guhA̱|yat||kam|svit|garBa̱m|prathamam|daddhrE|Apa̍ḥ|yatra̍|dEvAḥ|samaga̍cCantEti̍# saM - agacCanta|viśvE̱||tam|it|garBa̱m|prathamam|daddhrE|Apa̍ḥ|yatra̍|dEvAḥ|samaga̍cCantEti̍# saM - agacCanta|viśvE̱||ajasya̍|nABau̱|adhIti̍|Eka̱m|arpi̍tam|yasminn̍|idam|viśva̱m|Buva̍nam|adhIti̍|śritam||viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|hi|ajaniṣṭa|dEvaḥ|At|it|gandharvaḥ|aBavat|dvitIya̍ḥ||tRutIya̍ḥ|pitA|janitA|Oṣa̍dhInAm|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyA̍ parO dEvEBirasurairguhA̍ yat|kaṅ svidgarBaM̍ prathamaM daddhra̍ ApO yatra# dEvAḥ samagacCanta̍ viśvE̱||tamidgarBaM̍ prathamaM daddhra̍ ApO yatra# dEvAḥ samagacCanta̍ viśvE̱|ajasya nABAvaddhyEka-marpitaM̍ ~MyasminnidaM̍ ~MviśvaM Buvanamadhi̍# śritaM||viśvakarmA̍ hyajaniṣṭa̍ dEva Adid-gandharvO̍ aBavad̍ dvitIyaḥ|tRutIya̍ḥ̍ pitA janitauṣa̍dhInA̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam apAm|garBa̱m|vIti|adadhAt|purutrEti̍# puru - trA||cakṣuṣaḥ|pitA|mana̍sA|hi|dhIra̍ḥ|GRutam|EnE̍ iti|ajanat|nanna̍mAnE̍ iti||yadA|it|antA̱ḥ|ada̍dRuṃhanta|pUrvE̱|At|it|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|aprathEtAm||viśvataścakṣuriti̍# viśvataḥ̍ - cakṣuḥ|uta|viśvatOmuKa̍ iti# viśvataḥ̍ - muKaḥ|viśvatOhasta̍ iti# viśvataḥ̍ - hastaḥ|uta|viśvataspAditi̍# viśvataḥ-pAt||samiti̍|bAhuByAmiti̍# bAhu-ByAm|namati|samiti̍|pata̍traiḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|janayann|dEvaḥ|Eka̍ḥ||kim|svit|AsIt|adhiṣṭhAnamitya̍dhi̍ - sthAna̱m|AraMBaṇamityA̱̍ - raMBaṇam|katamat|svit|kim|AsIt||yadi̍|BUmi̱m|janayann̍|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mapAM garBaM ~MvyadadhAt̍ purutrA||cakṣuṣaḥ̍ pitA manasA̍ hi dhIrO# GRutamEnE̍ ajanannannamAnE|yadEdantA̍ adadRuṃhanta̍ pUrva Adid dyAvApRuthivI̍ aprathEtAM||viśvata̍-ścakṣuruta̍ viśvatOmuKO̍ viśvatOhasta̍ uta viśvataspAt|saM̍ bAhuByAM namati̍ saM patatrai̍ rdyAvApRuthivI̍ janayan̍ dEva Ekaḥ||kiṅ̍ svidAsI-dadhiṣṭhAna̍-mAraMBa̍ṇaM̍ katamath svit kimAsIt|yadI̍ BUmiM̍ janayan̍ - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|vIti|dyAm|aurṇO̱t|mahinA|viśvaca̍kṣA̍ iti# viśva - cakṣAḥ||kim|svit|vana̱m|kaḥ|u|saḥ|vRukṣaḥ|AsIt|yataḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|niṣṭatakṣuriti# niḥ - tatakṣuḥ||manIṣiṇaḥ|mana̍sA|pRucCata̍|it|u|tat|yat|addhyati̍ṣṭhaditya̍dhi̍ - atiṣṭhat|Buva̍nAni|dhArayann̍||yA|tE|dhAmA̍ni|paramAṇi̍|yA|avamA|yA|maddhyamA|viśvakarmanniti̍# viśva - karmann|uta|imA||śikṣa|saKi̍Bya̍ iti saKi# - Byaḥ|haviṣi|svadhAva̍ iti# svadhA - vaḥ|svayam|yajasva|tanuva̱m|juṣAṇaḥ||vAcaḥ|pati̱m|viśvakarmAṇamiti̍# viśva - karmAṇam|UtayE̱|10 (50)
verses.samhita: viśvakarmA̍ vi dyAmaurṇO̱n mahinA viśvacakṣAḥ||kiṅ̍ svidvanaM ka u sa vRukṣa AsIdyatO̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ niṣṭatakṣuḥ|manI̍ṣiṇO̍ manasA̍ pRucCatEdu tadyadaddhyatiṣṭhad̍ BuvanAni̍ dhArayann||yA̍ tE dhAmAni̍ paramAṇi yA&vamA yA maddhyamA̍ viśvakarmannutEmA|śikṣA̍ saKiByO̍ haviṣi# svadhAvaḥ svayaM ~Myajasva̍ tanuvaM̍ juṣAṇaḥ||vAcaspatiM̍ ~MviśvakarmAṇamUtayE̍# - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam manOyujamiti# manaḥ - yuja̱m|vAjE̱|adya|huvEma||saḥ|naḥ|nEdiṣṭhA|hava̍nAni|jOṣatE|viśvaśa̍BUMqriti̍# viśva - śaBUMqḥ|avasE|sAdhukarmEti̍# sAdhu - karmA||viśvakarmanniti̍ viśva-karmann|haviṣA̱|vAvRudhAnaḥ|svayam|yajasva|tanuva̱m|juṣAṇaḥ||muhya̍ntu|anyE|aBita̍ḥ|sapatnA̱ḥ|iha|asmAka̱m|maGavEti̍# maGa - vA|sUriḥ|astu||viśvakarmanniti̍ viśva# - karmann|haviṣA̱|vad^^rdhanEna|trAtAra̱m|indra̱m|akRuṇOḥ|avaddhyam||tasmai̱|viśa̍ḥ|samiti̍|anamanta|pUrvIḥ|ayam|ugraḥ|vihavya̍# iti# vi-havyaḥ|yathA̱|asa̍t||samudrAya̍|vayunA̍ya|sindhU̍nAm|pata̍yE|nama̍ḥ̍ ( )||nadInA̱m|sarvAsAm|pitrE|juhuta|viśvaka̍rmaṇa̍ iti# viśva - karmaṇa|viśvA̱|ahA̱|amartyam|haviḥ||11̍ (59)
verses.samhita: manOyujaM ~MvAjE# adyA huvEma|sa̍ nO nEdiṣṭhA̍ havanAni̍ jOṣatE viśvaśaBUMrava̍sE̍ sAdhukarmA||viśva̍karman.̍ haviṣA# vAvRudhAnaḥ svayaM ~Myajasva̍ tanuvaM̍ juṣAṇaḥ|muhyantvanyE̍ aBitaḥ̍ sapatnA# ihAsmAkaM̍ maGavA# sUrirastu||viśva̍karman.̍ haviṣA varddhanEna̍ trAtAramindra-makRuṇOravaddhyaM|tasmai̍ viśaḥ samanamanta̍ pUrvIrayamugrO vihavyO̍# yathA&sat||samudrAya̍# vayunAya̍ sindhUnAM̍ patayE̍ namaḥ̍ ( )|nadInAṃq sarvAsAM̍ pitrE juhutA̍ viśvakarmaṇE̍ viśvA&hAmartyaṃ̍ haviḥ||11

verses.padam: - Padam uditi|Enam|uttarAmityu̍t̍ - tarAm|naya|agnE̱|GRutEna|AhutEtyA̱ - huta||rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|samiti̍|sRuja|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|ca|dhanEna|ca||indra̍|imam|pratarAmiti̍# pra-tarAm|kRudhi|sajAtAnAmiti# sa - jAtAnA̱m|asat|vaśI||samiti|Enam|varca̍sA|sRuja|dEvEBya̍ḥ|BAgadhA̍ iti# BAga - dhAḥ|asat||yasya|kurmaḥ|haviḥ|gRuhE|tam|agnE|vad^^rdhaya|tvam||tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|adhIti̍|bravann|ayam|ca|brahma̍ṇaḥ|pati̍ḥ||uditi̍|u|tvA|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: udEnamuttarAM̍ nayAgnE# GRutEnA&&huta|rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ saṃ sRuja̍ prajayA# ca dhanEna̍ ca||indrEmaM pratarAM̍ kRudhi̍ sajAtAnA-masadvaśI|samE̍naM̍ ~MvarcasA̍ sRuja dEvEByO# BAgadhA asat||yasya̍# kurmO havirgRuhE tamagnE̍ varddhayA tvaM|tasma# dEvA adhi# bravannayaM ca brahmaṇaspati̍ḥ||udu̍# tvA viśvE# dEvA - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|Barantu|citti̍Biriti̍ citti# - Biḥ||saḥ|naḥ|Bava|śivatama̍ iti# śiva - tamaḥ|supratIka̍ iti# su - pratIkaḥ|viBAva̍suriti̍# viBA - vasuḥ||pa~jca|diśa̍ḥ|daivI̱ḥ|yajñam|avantu|dEvIḥ|apEti̍|ama̍tim|durmatimiti̍# duḥ - matim|bAdhamAnAḥ||rAyaḥ|pOṣE̱|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|ABajantIrityA̱̍ - BajantIḥ||rAyaḥ|pOṣE̱|adhIti̍|yajñaḥ|asthAt|sami̍ddha̍ iti saM - iddhE|agnau|adhIti|mAmahAnaḥ||ukthapa̍tra̍ ityuktha - patraḥ|Iḍyaḥ|gRuBItaḥ|taptam|Garmam|parigRuhyEti̍# pari-gRuhya|ayajanta||UrjA|yat|yajñam|aśa̍manta|dEvAḥ|daivyA̍ya|dhartrE|jOṣṭrE̱||dEvaśrIriti̍# dEva - śrIḥ|śrImaṇA̍ iti śrI - manAḥ|śatapayA̍ iti# śata - payAḥ|13 (50)
verses.samhita: agnE Barantu̍ cittiBiḥ|sa̍ nO# Bava śivatamaḥ̍ supratIkO̍ viBAvasuḥ||pa~jca̍ diśO daivI̱ryajñamavantu̍ dEvIrapAmatiM̍ durmatiM bAdhamAnAḥ|rAyaspOṣE̍# yajñapati-mABaja̍ntIḥ||rAyaspOṣE̍ adhi# yajñO asthAth̍ samiddhE̍ agnAvadhi# mAmahAnaḥ|ukthapatra̍ IḍyO# gRuBItastaptaM GarmaM parigRuhyA̍yajanta||UrjA̍ yad-yajñamaśamanta̍ dEvA daivyAya̍ dhartrE jOṣṭrE̱|dEvaśrIḥ śrImaṇAḥ̍ śatapayAḥ̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam parigRuhyEti# pari - gRuhya|dEvAḥ|yajñam|Ayann||sUrya̍raśmiriti̍ sUrya# - raśmiḥ|harikEśa̍ iti hari# - kEśaḥ|purastA̱t|savitA|jyOtiḥ|uditi̍|ayAn|aja̍sram||tasya̍|pUṣA|prasavamiti̍# pra - savam|yAti|dEvaḥ|sapaMśyanniti# saM - paśyann|viśvA̱|Buva̍nAni|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ||dEvAḥ|dEvEByaḥ|addhvaryanta̍ḥ|asthuḥ|vItam|śamitrE|śamitA|yajaddhyai̱||turIya̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yatra̍|havyam|Eti̍|tata̍ḥ|pAvakAḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱-śiṣaḥ|naḥ|juṣantAm||vimAna̍ iti# vi-mAnaḥ|Eṣaḥ|divaḥ|maddhyE̱|AstE|ApaprivAnityA̱̍ - paprivAn|rOdasI̍ iti|antari̍kṣam||saḥ|viśvAcI̱ḥ|aBIti̍|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parigRuhya# dEvA yajñamAyann||sUrya̍raśmirqḥari̍kEśaḥ̍ purastA̱th savitA jyOtirudayAṃq̍ ajasraM|tasya̍# pUṣA prasavaM̍ ~MyAti̍ dEvaḥ sapaMśyan viśvA BuvanAni̍ gOpAḥ||dEvA dEvEByO# addhvaryantO# asthurvItaṃ śamitrE̍ śamitA̍ yajaddhyai̱|turIyO# yajñO yatra# havyamEti tataḥ̍ pAvakA AśiṣO# nO juṣantAM||vimAna# Eṣa divO maddhya# Asta ApaprivAn rOdasI̍ antarikṣaM|sa̍ viśvAcIraBi̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam caṣṭE|GRutAcI̱ḥ|antarA|pUrva̱m|aparam|ca|kEtum||ukṣA|samudraḥ|aruṇaḥ|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|pUrvasya|yOni̱m|pituḥ|Eti̍|vivEśa||maddhyE̱|divaḥ|nihi̍ta̍ iti ni - hitaḥ|pRuśniḥ|aśmA̱|vIti̍|cakramE|raja̍saḥ|pAti|antau̱||indra̱m|viśvA̱ḥ|avIvRudhann|samudravya̍casamiti̍# samudra-vyacasam|giraḥ||rathIta̍mamiti̍# rathi - tamam|rathInAm|vAjAnAm|satpa̍timiti̍ sat - patim|pati̱m||sumnahUriti# sumna - hUḥ|yajñaḥ|dEvAn|Eti|ca|vakṣat|yakṣa̍t|agniḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvAn|Eti̍|ca|vakṣat||vAja̍sya̍ ( )|mA|prasavEnEti# pra - savEna|udgrABEṇEtyu̍t̍ - grABEṇa|uditi̍|agraBIt||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indra̍ḥ|mE|nigrABEṇEti̍# ni - grABEṇa|adha̍rAn|akaḥ||udgrABamityu̍t̍ - grABam|ca|nigrABamiti# ni - grABam|ca|brahma|dEvAḥ|avIvRudhann||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|mE|viṣUcInAn|vIti̍|asyatAm||15̍ (76) (dEvAḥ - śatapayA̍ - aBi - vAjasya̍ - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca̍ ) (A3)
verses.samhita: caṣṭE̍ GRutAcIrantarA̍ pUrvamaparaM̍ ca kEtuM||ukṣA samudrO̍ aruṇaḥ̍ suparṇaḥ̍ pUrvasya̍ yOniM̍ piturA vivEśa|maddhyE̍# divO nihitaḥ̍ pRuśniraśmA vi cakramE̍ rajasaḥ̍ pAtyantau̱||indraM ~MviśvA# avIvRudhanth samudravyacasaM̍ giraḥ|rathIta̍maṃ̍ rathInAM ~MvAjAnAṃq̍ satpatiM̍ pati̱M||sumnahUryajñO dEvAṃ A ca# vakṣadyakṣadagnirdEvO̍ dEvAṃ A ca# vakṣat||vAjasya̍ ( ) mA prasavEnO̱d-grABEṇO-dagraBIt|athA̍# sapatnAṃq indrO# mE nigrABEṇAdharAṃ̍ akaḥ||udgrABaM ca# nigrABaM ca brahma# dEvA avIvRudhann|athA̍# sapatnAnindrAgnI̍ mE# viṣUcInAn vyasyatAM||15̍

verses.padam: - Padam Aśuḥ|śiśAnaḥ|vRuṣaBaḥ|na|yuddhmaḥ|GanAGanaḥ|kṣOBa̍ṇaḥ|cara.ṣaṇInAm||saMqkranda̍na̍ iti# saM - krandanaḥ|animiṣa̍ ityani̍ - miṣaḥ|EkavIra ityEka̍ - vIraḥ|śatam|sEnA̱ḥ|ajayat|sAkam|indraḥ||sakraMnda̍nEnEti̍# saM - krandanEna|animiṣEṇEtya̍ni̍ - miṣEṇa|jiṣṇunA̱|yutkArEṇEti̍# yut - kArEṇa|duścyavanEnEti̍# duḥ-cyavanEna|dhRuṣṇunA̱||tat|indrE̍ṇa|jayata|tat|sahaddhvaMq|yudha̍ḥ|naraḥ|iṣu̍hastEnEtIṣu̍# - hastEna|vRuṣṇA̱||saḥ|iṣuhastairitIṣu̍# - hastaiḥ|saḥ|niṣa~ggiBiriti# niṣa~ggi - Biḥ|vaśI|saṅsraṣṭEti saM - sraṣṭA|saḥ|yudhaḥ|indra̍ḥ|gaṇEna̍||saṃqsRuṣṭajiditi̍# saṃsRuṣṭa - jit|sOmapA iti# sOma - pAḥ|bAhuśad^^rdhIti# bAhu - śad^^rdhI|Ud^^rdhvadhanvEtyUd^^rdhva - dhanvA|pratihitABiriti̍ prati# - hitABiḥ|astA̱||bRuhaspatE|parIti̍|dIya|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Aśuḥ śiśAnO̍ vRuṣaBO na yuddhmO GanAGanaḥ̍ kṣOBaṇa-ścaṛṣaṇInAM|saMkranda̍nO&nimiṣa̍ Eka̍ vIraḥ śataṃ sEnA# ajayath sAkamindraḥ||saMkranda̍nEnA̍ nimiṣEṇa# jiṣṇunA# yutkArEṇa# duścyavanEna# dhRuṣṇunA̱|tadindrEṇa̍ jayata tath sahaddhvaM̍ ~MyudhO# nara iṣuhastEna̍ vRuṣṇA̱||sa iṣuhastaiḥ̍ sa niṣaMgiBi̍rvaśI̍ saṅsraṣṭA̍ sa yudha indrO# gaṇEna|saṃqsRuṣṭajith̍ sOmapA̍ bAhuśarddhyU̱rddhvadha̍nvA̍ pratihitABirastA̱||bRuha̍spatE̍ pari# dIyA- [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam rathEna|rakṣOhEti̍# rakṣaḥ - hA|amitrAn|apabAdha̍mAna̍ ityapa̍ - bAdhamAnaḥ||praBa~jjanniti̍# pra - Ba~jjann|sEnA̱ḥ|pramRuṇa iti# pra - mRuṇaḥ|yudhA|jayann|asmAka̱m|Edhi|avitA|rathA̍nAm||gOtraBidamiti̍# gOtra - Bida̱m|gOvidamiti# gO - vida̱m|vajrabAhumiti̍ vajra# - bAhum|jayantam|ajma̍|pramRuṇantamiti̍# pra - mRuṇanta̱m|OjasA||imam|sajAtA̍ iti# sa - jAtAḥ|anviti|vIrayaddhvam|indra̱m|saKAyaḥ|anu̍|samiti̍|raBaddhvam||balavijñAya̍ iti# bala - vijñAyaḥ|sthaviraḥ|pravI̍ra̍ iti pra - vIraḥ|sahasvAn|vAjI|saha̍mAnaḥ|ugraḥ||aBivI̍ra̍ ityaBi - vIraḥ|aBisatvEtyaBi - satvA|sahOjA iti# sahaḥ - jAḥ|jaitra̱m|indra|ratha̱m|Eti|tiṣṭha|gOviditi̍# gO - vit||aBIti|gOtrAṇi̍|saha̍sA|gAha̍mAnaḥ|adAyaḥ|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rathEna̍ rakṣOhA &mitrAṃ# apa bAdhamAnaḥ|praBaMjanth̍ sEnA̱ḥ pramRuṇO yudhA jayannasmAka̍-mEddhyavitA̍ rathAnAM||gOtraBida̍M̍ gOvidaM ~MvajrabAhuM̍ jayantamajma̍# pramRuṇanta-mOjasA|imaṃ̍ sajAtA̍ anuvIra-yaddhvamindraṃ̍# saKAyO&nu saṃ raBaddhvaM||balavijñAyaḥ-sthavi̍raḥ̍ pravIraḥ̍ sahasvAn.̍ vAjI sahamAna̍ ugraḥ|aBivIrO̍ aBisatvA̍ sahOjA jaitramindra̍ rathamAtiṣṭha̍ gOvit||aBi gOtrAṇi sahasA̍ gAhamAnO&dAyO-̍ [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam vIraḥ|śatamanyuriti̍# śata - manyuḥ|indraḥ||duścyavana̍ iti# duḥ - cyavanaḥ|pRutanAṣAṭ|ayuddhyaḥ|asmAka̱m|sEnA̱ḥ|avatu|prEti|yuthsviti̍# yut - su||indraḥ|AsAm|nEtA|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|yajñaḥ|puraḥ|Etu|sOma̍ḥ||dEvasEnAnAmiti̍# dEva - sEnAnA̱m|aBiBa~jjatInAmityaBi̍ - Ba~jjatInAm|jayantInAm|maruta̍ḥ|yantu|agrE̱||indra̍sya|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|varu̍ṇasya|rAjña̍ḥ|AdityAnA̱m|marutA̱m|śarddha̍ḥ|ugram||mahAma̍nasAmiti̍# mahA - manasAm|BuvanacyavAnAmiti# Buvana - cyavAnA̱m|GOṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|jaya̍tAm|uditi̍|asthAt||asmAka̱m|indra̍ḥ|samRu̍tEṣviti̍ saM - RutEṣu|dhvajEṣu|asmAka̱m|yAḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|tA:|jayantu||18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vIraḥ śatamanyurindra̍ḥ|duścyavanaḥ̍ pRutanAṣAḍa̍# yuddhyO̱-smAkaṃq sEnA# avatu pra yuthsu||indra# AsAM-nEtA bRuhaspati rdakṣiṇA̍ yajñaḥ pura Etu̍ sOmaḥ|dEvasEnAnA̍-maBiBa~jjatInAM̍ jayantInAM̍ marutO# yantvagrE̱||indrasya̍ vRuṣṇO varuṇasya̍ rAjña# AdityAnA̱M marutAṃq śarddha# ugraM|mahAmanasAM̍ BuvanacyavAnAM GOṣO# dEvAnAM jayatA̍ mudasthAt||asmAka-mindraḥ̍ samRutEṣu̍ dhvajEṣvasmAkaM ~MyA iṣavastA̍ jayantu|18̍

verses.padam: - Padam asmAka̱m|vIrAḥ|uttara̍ ityut - tarE|Bavantu|asmAn|u|dEvAḥ|avata|havEṣu||uditi̍|harq.ṣaya|maGavanniti̍# maGa - vann|AyudhAni|uditi̍|satva̍nAm|mAmakAnA̱m|mahAṃ̍si||uditi̍|vRutrahanniti̍# vRutra-hann|vAjinA̱m|vAjinAni|uditi̍|rathA̍nAm|jaya̍tAm|Etu|GOṣa̍ḥ||upa̍|prEti̍|ita|jaya̍ta|naraḥ|sthirAḥ|vaḥ|santu|bAhava̍ḥ||indra̍ḥ|vaḥ|śarma̍|yacCatu|anAdhRuṣyA̍ ityanA̍ - dhRuṣyAḥ|yathA̱|asatha||ava̍sRuṣṭEtyava̍# - sRuṣṭA|parEti|pata|śara̍vyE|brahma̍saṃśitEti̍ brahma-saṃqśitA||gacCa̍|amitrAn̍|prEti̍|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asmAkaM̍ ~MvIrA uttarE̍ BavantvasmAnu# dEvA avatA havEṣu||uddha̍ṛṣaya̍ maGavannA-yudhA-nyuthsatva̍nAM̍ mAmakAnAM mahAṃsi|udvRu̍trahan̍ vAjinAM ~MvAjinAnyud-rathA̍nAM̍ jayatAmEtu̍ GOṣaḥ||upa̍ prEta jayatA̍ naraḥsthirA vaḥ̍ santu bAhavaḥ|indrO̍# vaḥ śarma# yacCa tvanA-dhRuṣyA yathAsatha||ava̍sRuṣṭA̍ parA# pata śaravyE̍ brahma# saṃśitA|gacCAmitrAn pra- [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam viśa|mA|EṣAm|kam|cana|uditi|śiṣaḥ||marmA̍ṇi|tE|varma̍Biriti̍ varma# -Biḥ|CAdayAmi|sOmaḥ|tvA|rAjA̱|amRutE̍na|aBIti̍|vastAm||urOḥ|varI̍yaḥ|vari̍vaḥ|tE|astu|jaya̍ntam|tvAm|anviti̍|madantu|dEvAḥ||yatra̍|bAṇAḥ|sapaMtantIti̍# saM - patanti|kumArAḥ|viśiKA̍ iti# vi - śiKAḥ|iva||indraḥ|naḥ|tatra̍|vRutrahEti̍# vRutra - hA|viśvAhEti# viśvA - hA|śarma|yacCatu||20̍ (40) (dIyA - &dAyO - jayantva̍ - mitrAn pra - catvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: viśa̍ maiṣAM ka~jcanOcCiṣaḥ||marmA̍ṇi̍ tE varmaBiśCAdayAmi̍ sOmastvA̍ rAjA &mRutEnABi-va̍stAM|urOrvarI̍yO̍ varivastE̍ astu jayantaM̍ tvAmanu# madantu dEvAḥ||yatra# bAṇAḥ saMpatanti̍ kumArA viśiKA̍ iva|indrO̍# nastatra# vRutrahA viśvAhA̍ śarma# yacCatu||20 (dIyA - &dAyO - jayantva̍ - mitrAn pra - catvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAcI̱m|anviti|pradiśamiti̍# pra-diśa̱m|prEti|ihi|vidvAn|agnEḥ|agnE|purO̍ agniriti̍# puraḥ - agniḥ|Bava|iha||viśvA̱ḥ|AśA̱ḥ|dIdyAnaḥ|vIti̍|BAhi|Urja̱m|naḥ|dhEhi|dvipada̍ iti# dvi - padE̱|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padE||kramaddhvam|agninA̱|nAka̱m|uKya̱m|hastE̍ṣu|biBra̍taḥ||divaḥ|pRuṣṭham|suva̍ḥ|gatvA|miśrAḥ|dEvEBi̍ḥ|Addhvam||pRuthivyAḥ|aham|uditi̍|antari̍kṣam|Eti̍|aruham|antari̍kṣAt|diva̱m|Eti̍|aruham||divaḥ|nAka̍sya|pRuṣṭhAt|suva̍ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|agAm|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAcImanu# pradiśaM prEhi# vidvAnagnEragnE̍ purO agnirBavEha|viśvA̍ AśA dIdyAnO̍ vi BAhyUrjaM̍ nO dhEhi dvipadE catuṣpadE||krama̍ddhvamagninA̍ nAkamuKyaṃq hastEṣu̍ biBrataḥ|divaḥ̍ pRuṣṭhaṃ suvargatvA̍ miśrA dEvEBirAddhvaM||pRuthivyA̍ ahamudantarikṣa-mA&ru̍ha-mantari̍kṣAd̍ divamA&ruhaM|divO̍ nAkasya̍ pRuṣṭhAth suvarjyOtiragA-̍ [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam aham||suvaḥ|yanta̍ḥ|na|apEti̍|IkṣantE|Eti̍|dyAm|rOhanti|rOda̍sI̍ iti||yajñam|yE|viśvatO̍dhAramiti̍# viśvataḥ̍ - dhAram|suvidvAṃsa̍ iti su - vidvAṃqsaḥ|vitEnira iti# vi - tEnirE||agnE̱|prEti|ihi|prathamaḥ|dEvayatAmiti̍# dEva - yatAm|cakṣuḥ|dEvAnA̱m|uta|martyA̍nAm||iya̍kṣamAṇAḥ|BRugu̍Biriti̍ BRugu# - Biḥ|sajOṣA iti# sa-jOṣA̱ḥ|suvaḥ|yantu|yaja̍mAnAḥ|svasti||naktOṣAsA̱|sama̍nasEti̍ sa - manasA|virUpE̍ iti vi - rUpE|dhApayEtE̍ iti|śiśu̱m|Eka̱m|samIcI̍ iti||dyAvA̱|kṣAma̍|rukmaḥ|antaḥ|vIti̍|BAti|dEvAḥ|agnim|dhArayann|draviṇOdA̍ iti# draviṇaḥ - dAḥ||agnE̱|sahasrAkṣEti# sahasra - akṣa|22 (50)
verses.samhita: mahaM||suvaryantO nApE̱kṣanta A dyAṃ rOhanti̍ rOdasI|yajñaM̍ ~MyE viśvatOdhAraṃq̍ suvidvAṃsO̍ vitEnirE||agnE prEhi# prathamO dEvayatAM̍ cakṣurdEvAnA̍muta̍ martyAnAM|iya̍kṣamAṇA̍ BRuguBiḥ̍ sajOṣAḥ suvaryantu̍ yajamAnAḥ̍ svasti||naktOṣAsA samanasA̍ virUpE̍ dhApayEtE̍ śiśumEkaṃ# samIcI|dyAvA kṣAmA# rukmO antarvi BAti̍ dEvA agniM dhArayan̍ draviṇOdAḥ||agnE# sahasrAkṣa - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam śatamUd^^rdhanniti# śata - mUrdhann|śatam|tE|prAṇA iti# pra-anAḥ|sahasra̱m|apAna ityapa̍ - anAḥ||tvam|sAhasrasya|rAyaḥ|IśiṣE|tasmai̱|tE|vidhEma|vAjA̍ya|svAhA̱||suparṇa̍ iti# su-parṇaḥ|asi|garutmAn|pRuthivyAm|sIda|pRuṣṭhE|pRuthivyAḥ|sIda|BAsA|antari̍kṣam|Eti̍|pRuṇa|jyOti̍ṣA|diva̱m|uditi̍|staBAna|tEja̍sA|diśa̍ḥ|uditi̍|dRuṃqha||AjuhvA̍na̍ ityA̱ - juhvAnaḥ|supratI̍ka̍ iti# su - pratIkaḥ|purastA̱t|agnE̱|svAm|yOni̱m|Eti̍|sIda|sAddhyA||asminn|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|adhIti|utta̍rasminnityut̍ - tarasminn|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|23 (50)
verses.samhita: śatamUrddha~jCataM tE̱ prAṇAḥ sahasramapAnAḥ|tvaṃ̍ sAhasrasya̍# rAya IśiṣE̍ tasmai# tE vidhEma vAjAya̍ svAhA̱||suparṇO&si̍ garutmA̱n pRuthivyAṃ sIda̍ pRuṣṭhE pRuthivyAḥ̍ sIda̍ BAsA&*ntarikṣamA̍ pRuṇa̍ jyOtiṣA̍ divamuttaBAna̍ tEjasA̍ diśa ud dRuṃha||AjuhvA̍naḥ̍ supratIkaḥ̍ purastAdagnE svAM ~MyOnimA sIda̍ sAddhyA|asminth-sadhasthE addhyuttarasmin̍ viśvE# dEvA - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam yajamAnaḥ|ca|sIdata||prEddha̍ iti pra - iddhaḥ|agnE|dIdihi|puraḥ|naḥ|ajasrayA|sUrmyA̱|yaviṣṭha||tvAm|śaśva̍ntaḥ|upEti̍|yanti|vAjA̱ḥ||vidhEma̍|tE|paramE|janmann̍|agnE|vidhEma̍|stOmai̱ḥ|ava̍rE|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE||yasmA̱t|yOnE̱ḥ|udArithEtyut̍ - Aritha|yajE̱|tam|prEti̍|tvE̍ iti|havIṃṣi̍|juhurE|sami̍ddha̍ iti saM - iddhE||tAm|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyasya|citrAm|Eti|aham|vRuṇE|sumatimiti̍# su - matim|viśvajanyAmiti̍# viśva - janyAm||yAm|asya|kaṇvaḥ|adu̍hat|prapI̍nAmiti̍ pra-pInAm|sahasradhArAmiti̍# sahasra# - dhArAm|24 (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnaśca̍ sIdata||prEddhO# agnE dIdihi purO nO&jasrayA̍ sUrmyA# yaviṣṭha|tvAṃ śaśvanta̍ upa# yanti vAjA̱ḥ||vidhEma# tE paramE janmannagnE̍ vidhEma stOmairavarE̍ sadhasthE̱|yasmAd-yOnErudAri̍thA̍ yajE taM pratvE havIṃṣi# juhurE samiddhE||tAṃ̍ saviturvarE̱ṇyasya̍ citrAmA&haM ~MvRuṇE̍ sumatiM ~MviśvajanyAM|yAma̍sya̍ kaṇvO aduhat̍ prapInAṃ̍ sahasradhArAM̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam payasA|mahIm|gAm||sapta|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# sam - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|sapta|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|sapta|dhAma̍|priyAṇi̍||sapta|hOtrA̱ḥ|saptadhEti̍# sapta - dhA|tvA|yajanti|sapta|yOnI̱ḥ|Eti|pRuṇasva|GRutEna̍||IdRu~g|ca|anyAdRu~g|ca|EtAdRu~g|ca|pratidRu~giti̍# prati - dRu~g|ca|mitaḥ|ca|saMmita̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|ca|saBarA̍ iti sa - BarAḥ||śukrajyOtiriti̍# śukra-jyOtiḥ|ca|citrajyOtiriti̍# citra-jyOtiḥ|ca|satyajyOtiriti̍# satya - jyOtiḥ|ca|jyOtiṣmAn|ca|satyaḥ|ca|RutapA̍ ityRuta-pAḥ|ca|atyaṃ̍hA̍ ityati# - aṃqhAḥ||25 (50)
verses.samhita: payasA̍ mahIM gAM||sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvAḥ saptaṛṣayaḥ̍ sapta dhAma# priyAṇi|sapta̍ hOtrA̱ḥ saptadhA tvA# yajanti sapta yOnIrA pRuṇasvA̍ GRutEna||IdRu~g̍ cA̱nyAdRu~g caitAdRu~gca̍# pratidRu~g ca# mitaśca saMmitaśca̍ saBarAḥ||śukrajyO̍tiśca̍ citrajyOtiśca̍ satyajyOtiśca̍ jyOtiṣmAṅśca̍ satyaścartapAścAtyaṃ̍hAḥ||25̍

verses.padam: - Padam RutajidityRuta̍ - jit|ca|satyajiditi# satya - jit|ca|sEnajiditi# sEna - jit|ca|suṣEṇa iti# su - sEnaḥ|ca|antya̍mitra̍ ityanti-amitraḥ|ca|dUrE̍ amitra̍ iti# dUrE - amitraḥ|ca|gaṇaḥ||Rutaḥ|ca|satyaḥ|ca|dhruvaḥ|ca|dharuṇaḥ|ca|dhartA|ca|vidhartEti̍# vi - dhartA|ca|vidhAraya iti# vi-dhArayaḥ||IdRukṣAsaḥ|EtAdRukṣA̍saḥ|u|sviti̍|naḥ|sadRukṣA̍saḥ|prati̍sadRukṣAsa̍ iti prati# - sadRukṣAsaḥ|Eti|itana||mitAsa̍ḥ|ca|saMmi̍tAsa̍ iti saM - mitAsaḥ|ca|naḥ|UtayE̱|saBarasa̍ iti sa - Barasaḥ|marutaḥ|yajñE|asminn|indra̱m|daivI̱ḥ|viśaḥ|maruta̍ḥ|anu̍vartmAna̍ ityanu-vartmAnaḥ̍ ( )|yathA̱|indra̱m|daivI̱ḥ|viśaḥ|maruta̍ḥ|anu̍vartmAna̍ ityanu# - vartmAnaḥ|Evam|imam|yajamAnam|daivI̱ḥ|ca|viśa̍ḥ|mAnu̍ṣIḥ|ca|anu̍vartmAna̍ ityanu# - vartmAnaḥ|Bavantu||26 (66) (agAṃq - sahasrAkṣa - dEvAḥ - sahasradhArA̍ - matyaṃhA̍ - anuvartmAnaḥ̍ - ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A5)
verses.samhita: Rutajicca# satyajicca# sEnajicca# suṣEṇaścAntyamitraśca̍ dUrEamitraśca̍ gaṇaḥ||Rutaśca# satyaśca# dhruvaśca# dharuṇaśca̍ dhartA ca# vidhartA ca# vidhArayaḥ||IdRukṣAsa̍ EtAdRukṣAsa̍ U ṣuṇaḥ̍ sadRukṣAsaḥ̍ pratisadRukṣAsa̍ Etana|mitAsa̍śca̍ saMmitAsaśca̍ na UtayE saBarasO̍ marutO yajñE asminnindraM daivIrviśO# marutO&nuvartmAnO̍ ( ) yathEndraM daivIrviśO# marutO&nuvartmAna̍ EvamimaM ~MyajamAnaM̍ daivI̱śca viśO mAnuṣIścAnu̍vartmAnO̍ Bavantu||26

verses.padam: - Padam jImUtasya|iva|Bavati|pratI̍kam|yat|varmI|yAti̍|samadAmiti̍# sa - madA̱m|upastha ityupa - sthE||anAviddhayEtyanA̱̍ - viddhayA|tanuvA̱|jaya|tvam|saḥ|tvA|varmaṇaḥ|mahimA|pipartu||dhanva̍nA|gAḥ|dhanva̍nA|Ajim|jayEma|dhanva̍nA|tIvrAḥ|samada̍ iti# sa - madaḥ|jayEma||dhanu̍ḥ|śatrO̱ḥ|apakAmamitya̍pa̍ - kAmam|kRuṇOti|dhanvanA|sarvA̱ḥ|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|jayEma||vakṣyantI̱|iva|it|Eti̍|ganIganti|karṇa̱m|priyam|saKA̍yam|pariṣasvajAnEti̍# pari - sasvajAnA||yOṣA̱|iva|śi~gktE|vitatEti vi - tatA|adhIti|dhanvann̍|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jImUtasyEva̍ Bavati pratIkaM̍ ~MyadvarmI yAti# samadAmupasthE̱|anA̍viddhayA̍ tanuvA# jaya tvaṃ sa tvA varmaṇO̍ mahimA pipartu||dhanva̍nA̍ gA dhanvanA&&jiM̍ jayEma̍ dhanvanA̍ tIvrAḥ samadO# jayEma|dhanuḥ śatrOrapakAmaM̍ kRuṇOti̍ dhanvanA̍ sarvA̱ḥ pradiśO# jayEma||vakṣyantIvEdA ganIganti̍ karṇaM̍ priyaṃ saKAyaM̍ pariṣasvajAnA|yOṣEva̍ śi~gktE vitatA&dhi dhanvan - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam jyA|iyam|samanE|pAraya̍ntI||tE̍ iti|Acara̍ntI̍ ityA̱ - carantI|sama̍nA|iva|yOṣA̱|mAtA|iva|putram|biBRutAm|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE||apEti|śatrUn̍|viddhyatAm|saM~MvidAna̍ iti# saM - vidAnE|ArtnI iti|imE̍ iti|viṣPurantI iti# vi-sPurantI̱|amitrAn||bahvInAm|pitA|bahuḥ|asya|putraḥ|ciścA|kRuṇOti|sama̍nA|avagatyEtyava̍# - gatya||iṣudhiritI̍ṣu̍ - dhiḥ|sa~gkA̱ḥ|pRutanAḥ|ca|sarvA̱ḥ|pRuṣṭhE|nina̍ddha̍ iti ni - naddhaḥ|jayati|prasUta̍ iti pra - sUtaḥ||rathE̱|tiṣṭhann|nayati|vAjina̍ḥ|puraḥ|yatra̍yatrEti̍ yatra-yatra|kAmaya̍tE|suṣArathiriti̍# su - sArathiḥ||aBIśUnAm|mahimAna̱m|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jyA iyaṃ samanE̍ pArayantI||tE̍ AcarantI̍ samanEva̍ yOṣA# mAtEva# putraM biBRutAmupasthE̱|apa̍ śatrUn# viddhyatAṃ saM~MvidAnE ArtnI# imE viṣPurantI̍# amitrAn||bahvInAM̍ pitA bahurasya̍ putraściścA kRuṇOti̍ samanA&vagatya̍|iṣudhiḥ̍ sa~gkAḥ pRutanAśca̍ sarvA̱ḥ pRuṣṭhE ninaddhO̍ jayati prasUtaḥ||rathE̍ tiṣṭhan̍ nayati vAjinaḥ̍ purO yatrayatra̍ kAmayatE̍ suṣArathiḥ|aBIśUnAM̍ mahimAnaM̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam panAyata|manaḥ|paścAt|anviti̍|yacCanti|raśmaya̍ḥ||tIvrAn|GOṣAn̍|kRuṇvatE|vRuṣa̍pAṇaya̍ iti vRuṣa-pAṇayaḥ|aśvA̱ḥ|rathE̍Biḥ|saha|vAjaya̍ntaḥ||avakrAma̍nta̍ ityava̍ - krAmantaḥ|prapa̍dairiti̍ pra - padaiḥ|amitrAn|kṣiṇanti̍|śatrUn̍|ana̍pavyayanta̍ ityanapa̍ - vyayantaḥ||rathavAhanamiti̍# ratha-vAhanam|haviḥ|asya|nAma̍|yatra̍|Ayu̍dham|nihi̍tamiti̍ ni - hitam|asya|varma||tatra̍|ratha̱m|upEti̍|śagmam|sadEma|viśvAhEti̍# viśvA - ahA̱|vayam|sumanasyamAnA̍ iti# su - manasyamAnAḥ||svAduṣaṃqsada̍ iti# svAdu - saṃqsadaḥ|pitara̍ḥ|vayOdhA̍ iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|kRucCrEśrita iti# kRucCrE - śritaḥ|śaktI̍vanta̍ iti śakti# - vantaḥ|gaBIrAḥ||citrasEnA̍ iti# citra - sEnAḥ|iṣubalA̍ itIṣu# - balAḥ|amRuddhrAḥ|satOvI̍rA̍ iti# sataḥ - vIrAḥ|uravaḥ|vrAtasAhA̍ iti# vrAta - sAhAḥ||brAhmaṇAsaḥ|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: panAyata manaḥ̍ paścAdanu# yacCanti raśmayaḥ||tIvrAn̍ GOṣA̱n kRuṇvatE vRuṣapAṇayO&śvA̍ rathEBiḥ̍ saha vAjayantaḥ|avakrAma̍ntaḥ̍ prapadairamitrA̱n̍ kṣiṇanti śatrUṃqranapavyayantaḥ||rathavAha̍naṃ̍ havirasya̍ nAma yatrA&&*yudhaM̍ nihitamasya̍ varma|tatrA̍ rathamupa# śagmaṃ sadEma̍ viśvAhA# vayaṃ sumanasyamA̍nAḥ||svAduṣaṃq̍ sadaḥ̍ pitarO# vayOdhAḥ kRucCrEśritaḥ̍ śaktIvantO̍ gaBIrAḥ|citrasEnA̍ iṣubalA̍ amRuddhrAḥ̍ satOvIrA̍ uravO̱ vrAtasAhAḥ||brAhmaṇAsaḥ̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam pitaraḥ|sOmyA̍saḥ|śivE̍ iti|naḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|anEhasA̱||pUṣA|naḥ|pAtu|duritAditi# duḥ - itAt|RutAvRudha ityRuta̍ - vRudhaḥ|rakṣa|mAki̍ḥ|naḥ|aGaśaṃ̍sa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaḥ|Iśata||suparṇamiti# su - parṇam|vastE|mRugaḥ|asyAḥ|dantaḥ|gOBi̍ḥ|sannaddhEti̍ saM - naddhA|patati|prasUtEti pra - sUtA||yatra|nara̍ḥ|samiti̍|ca|vIti̍|ca|drava̍nti|tatra̍|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|iṣavaḥ|śarma̍|yaṃqsann||RujI̍tE|parIti̍|vRu~ggdhi|naḥ|aśmA̱|Bavatu|naḥ|tanUḥ||sOma̍ḥ|adhIti̍|bravItu|naḥ|adi̍tiḥ|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pitaraḥ̍ sOmyAsaḥ̍ śivE nO dyAvApRuthivI̍ anEhasA̱|pUṣA̍ naḥ̍ pAtu duritAdRutAvRudhO̍ rakṣA mAkirnO̍ aGaśaṃsa̍ Iśata||suparṇaM ~MvastE̍ mRugO asyA̍ dantO gOBiḥ sannaddhA̍ patati prasUtA|yatrA̍ naraḥ saM ca vi ca dravanti̍ tatrAsmaByamiṣavaḥ̍ śarma# yaṃsann||RujItE̍ pari# vRu~ggdhi nO&śmA# Bavatu nastanUḥ|sOmO adhi# bravItu nO&ditiḥ̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam śarma|yacCatu||Eti̍|ja~gGanti|sAnu̍|EṣAm|jaGanAn̍|upEti̍|jiGnatE||aśvA̍janItyaśva̍# - ajani|pracEtasa̍ iti pra - cEtasaḥ|aśvAn|samathsviti̍# samat - su|cOdaya||ahiḥ|iva|BOgaiḥ|parIti̍|Eti|bAhum|jyAyA̱ḥ|hEtim|paribAdha̍mAna̍ iti# pari - bAdhamAnaḥ||hastaGna̍ iti# hasta - Gnaḥ|viśvA̱|vayunAni|vidvAn|pumAn̍|pumAṃ̍sam|parIti̍|pAtu|viśvata̍ḥ||vana̍spatE|vIḍva̍~gga̍ iti# vIḍu - a~ggaḥ|hi|BUyAḥ|asmathsaKEtyasmat - saKA|prataraṇa̍ iti# pra - taraṇaḥ|suvIra̍ iti# su - vIraḥ||gOBi̍ḥ|sanna̍ddha̍ iti saM - naddhaḥ|asi|vIḍayasva|AsthAtEtyA̱̍ - sthAtA|tE|jayatu|jEtvAni||divaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|parIti̍|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śarma# yacCatu||A ja~gGanti̍ sAnvEṣAM̍ jaGanAṃq upa# jiGnatE|aśvAjani̍ pracEtasO&śvA̱nth̍ samathsu# cOdaya||ahiriva̍ BOgaiḥ paryEti̍ bAhuM jyAyA# hEtiM paribAdha̍mAnaḥ|hastaGnO̍ viśvA# vayunAni̍ vidvAn pumAn pumAṃsaM̍ pari# pAtu viśvataḥ||vana̍spatE̍ vIḍva~ggO̍ hi BUyA asmath saKA̍ prataraṇaḥ̍ suvIraḥ|gOBiḥ̍ sannaddhO̍ asi vIḍayasvA&&sthAtA̍ tE# jayatu jEtvAni||divaḥ̍ pRuthivyAḥ̍ paryO- [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Ojaḥ|udBRu̍tamityut̍ - BRutam|vanaspatiBya̍ iti vanaspati-Byaḥ|parIti̍|ABRu̍tamityA̍ - BRutam|sahaḥ||apAm|OjmAna̱m|parIti̍|gOBi̍ḥ|AvRu̍tamityA-vRutam|indra̍sya|vajra̱m|haviṣA̱|ratha̱m|yaja||indra̍sya|vajra̍ḥ|marutA̱m|anI̍kam|mitrasya̍|garBa̍ḥ|varu̍ṇasya|nABi̍ḥ||saḥ|imAm|naḥ|havyadA̍timiti̍# havya - dAtim|juṣAṇaḥ|dEva|ratha|pratIti̍|havyA|gRuBAya||upEti̍|śvAsaya|pRuthivIm|uta|dyAm|purutrEti̍# puru - trA|tE|manutAm|viṣṭhitamiti̍ vi - sthitam|jagat||saḥ|dunduBE|sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|indrEṇa|dEvaiḥ|dUrAt|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ja ud-BRutaM̍ ~MvanaspatiByaḥ̍ paryABRutaṃq̍ sahaḥ|apAmOjmAnaM̍ pari gOBirAvRutamindra̍sya̍ vajraṃ# haviṣA rathaM̍ ~Myaja||indrasya̍ vajrO# marutAmanIkaM̍ mitrasya garBO varuṇasya̍ nABiḥ|sEmAM̍ nO# havyadAtiM̍ juṣAṇO dEva# ratha prati# havyA gRuBAya||upa̍# śvAsaya pRuthivImuta dyAM purutrA̍ tE# manutAM ~MviṣṭhitaM̍ jagat|sa̍ dunduBE̍ sajUrindrEṇa̍ dEvairdUrA- [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam davIyaḥ|apEti̍|sEdha|śatrUn̍||Eti̍|krandaya|bala̱m|Oja̍ḥ|naḥ|Eti̍|dhAḥ|niriti̍|sthanihi|duritEti̍# duḥ - itA|bAdhamAnaḥ||apEti̍|prOtha|dunduBE|ducCunAn̍|itaḥ|indra̍sya|muṣṭiḥ|asi|vIḍaya̍sva||Eti̍|amUḥ|aja|pratyAva̍rtayEti̍# prati - Avartaya|imAḥ|kEtumaditi̍# kEtu - mat|dunduBiḥ|vAvadIti||samiti|aśva̍parṇA̍ ityaśva-parṇAḥ|cara̍nti|naḥ|nara̍ḥ|asmAka̱m|indra|rathina̍ḥ|jayantu||33̍ (41) (dhanvan̍ - mahimAnaM - brAhmaṇAsO̍ - &ditiḥ̍ - pRuthivyAḥ pari# - dUrA - dEkacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: ddavIyO̍ apasEdha̍ śatrUn||A̍ krandaya̍ balamOjO# na A dhA niṣṭanihi̍ duritA bAdhamAnaḥ|apa̍# prOtha dunduBE ducCunAṃ# ita indrasya̍ muṣṭirasi̍ vIḍayasva||A&mUra̍ja̍ pratyAvartayEmAḥ̍ kEtumad̍ dunduBi̍ rvAvadIti|samaśva̍parṇAścara̍nti̍ nO narO&smAkamindra̍ rathinO# jayantu||33 (dhanvan̍ - mahimAnaM - brAhmaṇAsO̍ - &ditiḥ̍ - pRuthivyAḥ pari# - dUrA - dEkacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|akrandaḥ|prathamam|jAya̍mAnaḥ|udyannityu̍t-yann|samudrAt|uta|vA|purI̍ṣAt||śyEnasya̍|pakṣA|hariṇasya̍|bAhU̍ iti|upastutyamityu̍pa̍ - stutya̱m|mahi|jAtam|tE|arvann||yamEna̍|dattam|tritaḥ|Enam|Ayunak|indra̍ḥ|Enam|prathamaḥ|adhIti̍|atiṣṭhat||gandharvaḥ|asya|raśanAm|agRuBṇAt|sUrA̱t|aśva̱m|vasavaḥ|niriti̍|ataṣṭa||asi̍|yamaḥ|asi̍|Adityaḥ|arvann|asi̍|tritaḥ|guhyE̍na|vratEna̍||asi̍|sOmE̍na|samayA̱|vipRu̍kta̍ iti vi - pRuktaḥ|34 (50)
verses.samhita: yadakrandaḥ̍ prathamaM jAyamAna̍ udyanth samudrAduta̍ vA purIṣAt|śyEnasya̍# pakṣA hariṇasya̍# bAhU upastutyaM̍ mahi# jAtaM tE# arvann||yamEna# dattaM trita EnamAyunagindra̍# EṇaM prathamO addhyatiṣṭhat|gandharvO̍ asya̍ raśanAma-gRuBṇAth̍ sUrAdaśvaM̍ ~MvasavO nirataṣṭa||asi̍# yamO asyAdityO̍ arvannasi̍# tritO guhyEna̍ vratEna|asi̍ sOmEna̍ samayA vipRukta̍ - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam Ahuḥ|tE|trIṇi|divi|bandha̍nAni||trIṇi̍|tE|Ahuḥ|divi|bandha̍nAni|trIṇi̍|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|trIṇi|antaḥ|samudrE||uta|iva|mE|varu̍ṇaḥ|Canthsi|arvann|yatra̍|tE|Ahuḥ|paramam|janitra̱m||imA|tE|vAjinn|avamArja̍nAnItya̍va̍ - mArjanAni|imA|śaPAnA̱m|sanituḥ|nidhAnEti̍# ni - dhAnA̱||atra|tE|BadrAḥ|raśanAḥ|apaśyam|Rutasya̍|yAḥ|aBirakṣantIya̍Bi̍ - rakṣanti|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ||AtmAna̱m|tE|manasA|ArAt|ajAnAm|avaḥ|divA|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AhustE trIṇi# divi bandhanAni||trIṇi̍# ta Ahurdivi bandhanAni̍ trIṇyaPsu trIṇyantaḥ samudrE|utEva̍# mE varuṇaśCanth̍ syarvanq. yatrA# ta Ahuḥ paramaM̍ janitra̱M||imA tE# vAjinnavamArjanAnImA̍ śaPAnAṃ# saniturnidhAnA̱|atrA# tE BadrA raśanA̍ apaśyamRutasya̍ yA aBirakṣa̍nti̍ gOpAḥ||AtmAnaM̍ tE manasA&&rAda̍jAnAmavO̍ divA - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam patayantam|pata~ggam||śira̍ḥ|apaśyam|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|sugEBiriti# su - gEBiḥ|arEṇuBiritya̍rEṇu̍ - Biḥ|jEhamAnam|patatri||atra̍|tE|rUpam|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|apaśyam|jigIṣamAṇam|iṣaḥ|Eti̍|padE|gOḥ||yadA|tE|marta̍ḥ|anviti̍|BOga̱m|Ana̍ṭ|At|it|grasi̍ṣṭhaḥ|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|ajIgaḥ||anviti̍|tvA|ratha̍ḥ|anviti̍|marya̍ḥ|arvann|anviti̍|gAva̍ḥ|anviti̍|Baga̍ḥ|kanInA̱m||anviti̍|vrAtA̍saḥ|tava̍|saKyam|Iyuḥ|anviti̍|dEvAḥ|mamirE|vIrya̱m|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: patayantaM̍ pata~ggaM|śirO# apaśyaM pathiBiḥ̍ sugEBirarEṇuBirjEha̍mAnaM̍ patatri||atrA# tE rUpamuttamama̍paśyaM̍ jigIṣamAṇamiṣa̍ A padE gOḥ|yadA tE martO anu BOgamAnaḍAdid grasiṣṭha̍ OṣadhIrajIgaḥ||anu̍# tvA rathO anu maryO# arvannanu gAvO&nu Bagaḥ̍ kanInA̱M|anu vrAtAsastava̍# saKyamIyuranu̍# dEvA mamirE̍ vIryaM̍ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam tE||hiraṇyaśRu~gga̍ iti hiraṇya̍ - śRu~ggaḥ|ayaḥ|asya|pAdA̱ḥ|manO̍javA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - javAḥ|avaraḥ|indra̍ḥ|AsIt||dEvAḥ|it|asya|haviradyamiti̍# haviḥ - adya̱m|Ayann|yaḥ|arvantam|prathamaḥ|addhyati̍ṣṭhaditya̍dhi̍ - atiṣṭhat||IrmAntA̍sa̍ itIrma-antAsaḥ|silikamaddhyamAsa̍ iti silika-maddhyamAsaḥ|samiti̍|śUra̍ṇAsaḥ|divyAsa̍ḥ|atyA̱ḥ||haṃqsAḥ|iva|śrEṇiśa̍ iti# śrEṇi - śaḥ|yatantE|yat|Akṣiṣuḥ|divyam|ajma̱m|aśvA̱ḥ||tava̍|śarI̍ram|patayiṣṇu|arvann|tava̍|cittam|vAta̍ḥ|iva|dhrajI̍mAn||tava̍|śRu~ggA̍ṇi|viṣṭhitEti̍ vi - sthitA|purutrEti# puru - trA|araṇyEṣu|jarBu̍rAṇA|caranti||upa̍|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hiraṇyaśRu~ggO&yO̍# asya pAdA manOjavA̍ avara̍ indra# AsIt|dEvA idasya̍ haviradyamAyanq.̍ yO arvantaM̍ prathamO addhyatiṣṭhat||IrmAntA̍saḥ̍ silikamaddhyamAsaḥ̍ saṃ śUraṇAsO̍ divyAsO atyA̱ḥ|haṃqsA iva̍ śrEṇiśO yatantE̍ yadAkṣiṣurdivya-majmamaśvA̱ḥ||tava̍ śarIraM̍ patayiṣṇvarvan̍ tava# cittaM ~MvAta# iva dhrajImAn|tava̍ śRu~ggAṇi̍ viṣṭhitA̍ purutrA&raṇyEṣu̍ jarBurAṇA̍ caranti||upa - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|agAt|śasa̍nam|vAjI|arvA̱|dEvadrIcEti̍# dEva-drIcA̱|manasA|dIddhyA̍naḥ||ajaḥ|puraḥ|nIyatE|nABi̍ḥ|asya|anviti̍|paścAt|kavaya̍ḥ|yanti|rEBAḥ||upa̍|prEti̍|agAt|paramam|yat|sadhasthamiti̍# sadha - stham|arvAn|acCa̍|pitara̱m|mAtara̱m|ca||adya|dEvAn|juṣṭa̍tama̍ iti juṣṭa# - tamaḥ|hi|gamyAḥ|atha|Eti̍|śAstE|dAśuṣE̱|vAryA̍ṇi||38̍ (39) (vipRuktO̍ - divA - vIrya# - mupai - kAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: prAgAcCasanaM̍ ~MvAjyarvA# dEvadrIcA manasA̍ dIddhyAnaḥ|ajaḥ̍ purO nIyatE̍ nABirasyAnu̍# paścAt kavayO# yanti rEBAḥ||upa prAgA̱t paramaM ~Myath sadhasthamarvAṃq acCA# pitaraM̍ mAtaraM̍ ca|adyA dEvAn juṣṭatamO̍ hi gamyA athA&&śA̱stE dAśuṣE vAryAṇi||38̍ (vipRuktO̍ - divA - vIrya# - mupai - kAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mA|naḥ|mitraḥ|varuṇaḥ|aryamA|Ayuḥ|indra̍ḥ|RuBukṣA̍ ityRuBu̍ - kṣAḥ|marutaḥ|parIti̍|Kyann||yat|vAjina̍ḥ|dEvajA̍tasyEti̍# dEva - jAtasya|saptE̱ḥ|pravakṣyAma iti# pra - vakṣyAmaḥ|vidathE̱|vIryA̍ṇi||yat|nirṇijEti̍# niḥ - nijA̱|rEkṇasA|prAvRu̍tasya|rAtim|gRuBItAm|muKataḥ|naya̍nti||suprA~giti̍ su - prA~g|ajaḥ|mEmyat|viśvarU̍pa̍ iti# viśva - rUpaḥ|indrApUṣṇOritI̱ndrA-pUṣṇOḥ|priyam|apIti|Eti|pAtha̍ḥ||Eṣaḥ|CAga̍ḥ|puraḥ|aśvE̍na|vAjinA̱|pUṣṇaḥ|BAgaḥ|nIyatE|viśvadE̱vya̍ iti# viśva - dEvyaḥ||aBipriyamityaBi-̍ priya̱m|yat|purOḍAśa̱m|arvatA|tvaṣṭA̱|it|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mA nO# mitrO varuṇO̍ aryamA&&yurindra# RuBukṣA marutaḥ pari# Kyann|yad-vAjinO# dEvajAtasya̍ saptE̱ḥ pravakṣyAmO# vidathE# vIryAṇi||yannirṇijA̍ rEkṇasA̍ prAvRutasya̍ rAtiM gRuBItAM̍ muKatO̍ nayanti|suprA̍~gajO̍ mEmyad̍ viśvarUpa̍ indrApUṣṇOḥ priyamapyEti̍ pAthaḥ||Eṣa̍ cCAgaḥ̍ purO aśvEna̍ vAjinA# pUṣṇO BAgO nIyatE̍ viśvadE̱vyaḥ|aBipriyaM ~Myat purOḍAśamarva̍tA̍ tvaṣṭE - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|sauśravasAya|jinvati||yat|haviṣya̱m|Rutuśa̍ ityRutu̍ - śaḥ|dEvayAnamiti# dEva - yAna̱m|triḥ|mAnuṣAḥ|parIti̍|aśva̱m|naya̍nti||atra̍|pUṣṇaḥ|prathamaḥ|BAgaḥ|Eti|yajñam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|prativEdayanniti̍# prati - vEdayann|ajaḥ||hOtA̱|addhvaryuḥ|Ava̍yA̍ ityA - vayAḥ|agnimindha ityagniM̍ - indhaḥ|grAvagrABa iti# grAva - grABaḥ|uta|śaṅstA̱|suvipra̍ iti su - vipraḥ||tEna|yajñEna̍|sva̍raMkRutEnEti̍ su - arakRuMqtEna|sviṣṭEnEti̍ su - iṣṭEna|vakṣaṇA̱ḥ|Eti|pRuṇaddhvam||yUpavraskA̍ iti# yUpa - vraskAḥ|uta|yE|yUpavAhA iti# yUpa - vAhAḥ|caṣAla̱m|yE|aśvayUpAyEtyaśva-yUpAya̍|takṣa̍ti||yE|ca|arva̍tE|paca̍nam|saBaMrantIti̍# saM - Baranti|utO̍ iti|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dEnaṃ̍ sauśravasAya# jinvati||yaddhaviṣyamRutuśO̍ dEvayAnaM̍ trirmAnuṣAḥ̍ paryaśvaM nayanti|atrA̍# pUṣṇaḥ prathamO̍ BAga Eti̍ yajñaM dEvEByaḥ̍ prativEdayannajaḥ||hOtA̱&ddhvaryurAva̍yA̍ agnimindhO grAvagrABa̍ uta śaṅstA suvipraḥ|tEna̍# yajñEna svaraMkRutEna̍ sviṣṭEna̍ vakṣaṇA A pRuṇaddhvaM||yUpavraskA̍ uta yE yUpavAhAścaṣAlaM̍ ~MyE aśvayUpAya̍ takṣati|yE̍ cArvatE̍ pacanaṃ̍ saBaMrantyutO̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam tEṣA̱m|aBigU̱rtirityaBi - gUrtiḥ|naḥ|invatu||upa|prEti̍|agAt|sumaditi̍# su - mat|mE|adhAyi|manma|dEvAnA̱m|AśA̱ḥ|upEti̍|vItapRu̍ṣṭha̍ iti# vIta - pRuṣṭhaḥ||anviti|Enam|viprA̱ḥ|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|madanti|dEvAnA̱m|puṣṭE|cakRuma|subandhumiti̍# su - bandhu̱m||yat|vAjinaḥ|dAma̍|sadAMnamiti̍# saM - dAna̱m|arvataḥ|yA|śIrq.ṣaṇyA̱|raśanA|rajju̍ḥ|asya||yat|vA|Ga|asya|praBRu̍tamiti̍ pra - BRutam|AsyE̱|tRuṇa̱m|sarvA̱|tA|tE|apIti|dEvEṣu̍|astu||yat|aśva̍sya|kraviṣa̍ḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tEṣA-maBigU̱rtirna̍ invatu||upa prAgA̱th sumanmE&dhAyi̍ manma# dEvAnAmAśA upa# vItapRuṣṭhaḥ|anvE̍naM̍ ~MviprA RuṣayO̍ madanti dEvAnA̱M puṣṭE cakRumA̍ subandhu̱M||yad-vAjinO dAma# sadAMnamarvatO̍ yA śIṛṣaṇyA̍# raśanA rajjurasya|yadvA̍# GAsya praBRutamAsyE̍# tRuṇaṃq sarvA tA tE api# dEvEṣvastu||yadaśva̍sya̍ kraviṣO - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam makṣikA|Aśa̍|yat|vA|svarau̱|svadhi̍tAviti̍ sva - dhitau|riptam|asti||yat|hasta̍yOḥ|śamituḥ|yat|naKEṣu̍|sarvA̱|tA|tE|apIti̍|dEvEṣu̍|astu||yat|Uva̍ddhyam|udara̍sya|apavAtItya̍pa̍ - vAti|yaḥ|Amasya̍|kraviṣa̍ḥ|gandhaḥ|asti̍||sukRutEti̍# su - kRutA|tat|śamitAraḥ|kRuṇvantu|uta|mEdha̱m|śRutapAkamiti̍# śRuta - pAka̱m|pacantu||yat|tE|gAtrA̱t|agninA̱|pacyamAnAt|aBIti̍|śUla̱m|niha̍tasyEti̍ ni - hatasya|avadhAvatItyava̍ - dhAvati||mA|tat|BUmyA̱m|Eti̍|śriṣat̍ ( )|mA|tRuṇEṣu|dEvEBya̍ḥ|tat|uśadBya̍ ityuśat - Byaḥ|rAtam|astu||42 (57)
verses.samhita: makṣikA&&śa yadvA svarau svadhitau̍ riptamasti|yaddhasta̍yOḥ̍ śamituryannaKEṣu sarvA tA tE api# dEvEṣvastu||yadUva̍ddhyamudara̍syApavAti̍ ya Amasya# kraviṣO# gandhO asti|sukRutA̍ tacCamitAra̍ḥ̍ kRuṇvantUta mEdhaṃ# śRutapAkaM̍ pacantu||yat tE gAtrAdagninA̍# pacyamAnAdaBi̍ śUlaM nihatasyAvadhAva̍ti|mA̍ tad-BUmyAmA śriṣa̍ ( )-nmA tRuṇEṣu̍ dEvEByastaduśadByO# rAtamastu||42̍

verses.padam: - Padam yE|vAjina̱m|paripaśyantIti# pari-paśyanti|pakvam|yE|Im|Ahuḥ|suraBiḥ|niriti̍|hara|iti̍||yE|ca|arva̍taḥ|mAṃqsaBikṣAmiti̍# mAṃsa - BikṣAm|upAsata̍ ityupa̍ - AsatE|utO̍ iti|tEṣA̱m|aBigU̱rtirityaBi̍ - gUrtiḥ|naḥ|invatu||yat|nIkṣaṇam|mAṅqspaca̍nyAḥ|uKAyA̱ḥ|yA|pAtrA̍ṇi|yUṣṇaḥ|AsEca̍nAnItyA̱̍ - sEcanAni||UṣmaṇyA̱|apidhAnEtya̍pi̍ - dhAnA̱|carUṇAm|a~gkAḥ|sUnAḥ|parIti|BUṣanti|aśva̱m||nikrama̍ṇamiti̍# ni - kramaṇam|niṣada̍namiti̍# ni - sadanam|vivarta̍namiti̍# vi - vartanam|yat|ca|paḍbI̍śam|arva̍taḥ||yat|ca|papau|yat|ca|GAsim|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yE vAjinaM̍ paripaśyanti̍ pakvaM ~Mya ImAhuḥ̍ suraBirniṛharEti̍|yE̍ cArvatO̍ mAṃsaBikṣAmupAsata̍ utO tEṣAmaBigU̱rtirna̍ invatu||yannIkṣaṇaM̍ mAṅqspacanyA̍ uKAyA yA pAtrAṇi̍ yUṣṇa AsEcanAni|UṣmaṇyA̍&pidhAnA̍# carUṇAma~gkAḥ sUnAḥ pari# BUṣantyaśva̱M||nikramaṇaM̍ niṣadanaM̍ ~MvivartanaM̍ ~Myacca paḍbIśamarva̍taḥ|yacca̍# papau yacca# GAsiM -[ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam jaGAsa|sarvA̱|tA|tE|apIti̍|dEvEṣu̍|astu||mA|tvA|agniḥ|dhvanayit|dhUmaga̍ndhiriti̍# dhUma - gandhiḥ|mA|uKA|BrAjanti|aBIti̍|vikta|jaGri̍ḥ||iṣṭam|vItam|aBigU̱rtamityaBi̍ - gUrtam|vaṣaṭkRutamiti̍ vaṣaṭ̍ - kRutam|tam|dEvAsaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuBṇanti|aśva̱m||yat|aśvA̍ya|vAsa̍ḥ|upastRuṇantItyu̍pa̍ - stRuṇanti|adhIvAsamitya̍dhi̍ - vAsam|yA|hiraṇyAni|asmai||sandAnamiti̍# saM - dAna̱m|arvantam|paḍbI̍śam|priyA|dEvEṣu̍|Eti̍|yAmayanti||yat|tE|sAdE|maha̍sA|śUkRu̍tasyEti̍ śU - kRutasya|pArṣṇiyA|vA|kaśa̍yA|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jaGAsa sarvA tA tE api# dEvEṣvastu||mA̍ tvA&gni-rddhvanayid-dhUmaga̍ndhirmOKA̍ BrAjantyaBi̍ vikta̍ jaGriḥ|iṣṭaM̍ ~MvItamaBigU̱rtaM ~MvaṣaṭkRutaM̍ taM dEvAsaḥ prati# gRuBṇantyaśva̱M||yadaśvAya̍ vAsa# upastRuṇantyadhIvAsaM̍ ~MyA hiraṇyAnyasmai|sandAnamarva̍ntaM̍ paḍbIśaM̍ priyA dEvEṣvA yAmayanti||yat̍ tE# sAdE mahasA̍ śUkRutasya̍ pArṣṇiyA̍ vA kaśayA̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam vA|tutOda||srucA|iva|tA|haviṣa̍ḥ|addhvarEṣu̍|sarvA̱|tA|tE|brahma̍ṇA|sUdayAmi||catu̍striṃśaditi̍ catuḥ̍ - triṃqśat|vAjinaḥ|dEvaba̍ndhOriti̍# dEva - bandhOḥ|va~gkrI̱ḥ|aśvasya|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|samiti|Eti||acCi̍drA|gAtrA̱|vayunA̱|kRuṇOta|paru̍ṣparuriti̍ paruḥ̍ - paruḥ|anuGuṣyEtyanu-Guṣya̍|vIti̍|śasta||Eka̍ḥ|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|aśva̍sya|viśastEti̍# vi - śastA|dvA|yantArA̱|Bavataḥ|tathA̱|Rutuḥ||yA|tE|gAtrAṇAm|RututhEtyRu̍tu̍ - thA|kRuṇOmi|tAtEti̍ tA - tA|piṇḍAnAm|prEti̍|juhOmi|agnau||mA|tvA|tapat|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA tutOda|srucEva̍ tA haviṣO# addhvarEṣu sarvA tA tE brahmaṇA̍ sUdayAmi||catustriṃśad-vAjinO̍# dEvabandhO-rva~gkrI-raśva̍sya̍ svadhitiḥ̍ samEti|acCi̍drA̍ gAtrA# vayunA# kRuṇOta paruṣparuranuGuṣyA̍ vi śasta||Ekastvaṣṭuraśva̍syA̍ viśastA dvA yantArA# Bavatastathartuḥ|yA tE gAtrAṇAmRututhA̍ kRuṇOmi tAtA piṇḍAnAM̍ pra juhOmyagnau||mA̍ tvA# tapat - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam priyaḥ|AtmA|apiyantamityapi̍ - yanta̱m|mA|svadhitiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|tanuvaḥ|Eti̍|tiṣṭhipat|tE||mA|tE|gRuddhnuḥ|aviśastEtya̍vi̍ - śastA|atihAyEtyati-hAya̍|CidrA|gAtrA̍ṇi|asinA̱|mithu̍|kaḥ||na|vai|u|Etat|mriyasE|na|riṣyasi|dEvAn|it|Eṣi|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|sugEBiriti# su - gEBiḥ||harI̍ iti|tE|yu~jjA̱|pRuṣa̍tI̍ iti|aBUtAm|upEti̍|asthAt|vAjI|dhuri|rAsa̍Basya||sugavyamiti̍# su - gavya̱m|naḥ|vAjI|svaśviyamiti̍# su - aśviyam|puṃqsaḥ|putrAn|uta|viśvApuṣamiti̍# viśva -puṣa̱m|rayim ( )||anAgAstvamityanAgAḥ̍ - tvam|naḥ|aditiḥ|kRuṇOtu|kṣatram|naḥ|aśva̍ḥ|vanatAm|haviṣmAn̍||46̍ (59) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 9 Anuvaakams :- (aśman - ya imO - dEna̍ - mAśuḥ - prAcI̱M - jImUtasya̍ - yadakrandO̍ - mA nO# mitrO - yE vAjinaM - nava)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (aśman̍ - manOyujaM - prAcImanu - śarma# yacCatu - tEṣAmaBigU̱rtiḥ̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of śixth Prasam of KAndam 4 :- (aśman̍ - haviṣmAn)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||--------------------------------------
verses.samhita: priya AtmA&piyantaM mA svadhitistanuva̍ A tiṣṭhipat̍ tE|mA tE# gRuddhnu-raviśastA&tihAya̍# CidrA gAtrA̱ṇyasinA mithU# kaḥ||na vA uvEtanmri̍yasE̍ na riṣyasi̍ dEvAṃ idEṣi̍ pathiBiḥ̍ sugEBiḥ|harI̍# tE yu~jjA pRuṣatI̍ aBUtAmupA̱sthAd-vAjI dhuri rAsaBasya||sugavya̍M̍ nO vAjI svaśviyaM̍ puṃqsaḥ putrAṃ uta viśvApuṣaṃ̍# rayiM ( )|anAgAstvaM nO aditiḥ̍ kRuṇOtu kṣatraM nO aśvO# vanatAṃ haviṣmAn||46̍ praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 9 anuvAkams :- (aśman - ya imO - dEna̍ - mAśuḥ - prAcI̱M - jImUtasya̍ - yadakrandO̍ - mA nO# mitrO - yE vAjinaM - nava)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (aśman̍ - manOyujaM - prAcImanu - śarma# yacCatu - tEṣAmaBigU̱rtiḥ̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of sixth Prasam of Kaandam 4 :- (aśman̍ - haviṣmAn)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM caturtha kAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||OM namaḥ paramAtmanE , śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ , śrI guruByO namaḥ , hariḥ OM 4.7 caturthakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ - vasOrdhArAdiśiṣṭa saMskArABidhAnaM
